artist: Artist: Raoul Dufy; Author: Eugène Montfort; Publisher: Ambroise Vollard, Éditeur, Paris
creditline: Gift of Lisa and David Erickson
description: red leather-covered book with outer red leather and tan paper cover lined in red suede; tan paper-covered cardboard slipcase edged in red leather; orange suede endpapers; text illustrated with sketchy line-drawing style etchings of seascapes and figures; red, yellow and pale grey striped ribbon marker

title: La Belle-Enfant, ou L'Amour à Quarante Ans
